TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MoveActiveHandler(object o, MoveActiveArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed MoveActiveHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the MoveActiveHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the MoveActiveHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the MoveActiveHandler is removed from the event.
